title: Client won't begin update for open beta client.
body: Everytime I try to upgrade to the new client it doesn't start udpating, instead it just stays on launch and when I press launch it gives me an error code: (0xc00005) can anyone help me out I've tried running as admin, re-installing, deleting LoL Patcher and nothing seems to work.

replies.body:
This specific error usually crops up AVG or a similar Antivirus program isn't allowing League to run. You should be able to resolve this by either [**adding exceptions for League **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) or by temporarily disabling that antivirus until the update has finished.

Let me know if this helped.
